title: Goldtown
creator_credit: R. Maslyn Williams and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The story of Australia’s fabulous town with the “golden mile” - Kalgoorlie in Western Australia, a goldmining town in the midst of a forbidding desert where the water supply is piped hundreds of miles overland.
creator_credit_for_label: R. Maslyn Williams and Australian National Film Board
